message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.CR. 

The paper deals with the design and analysis of codes for storage systems, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and distributed systems (cs.DS). The focus on bandwidth costs and repair mechanisms suggests a networking (cs.NI) aspect to the work. The use of codes for resilience against eavesdropping suggests a security (cs.CR) aspect. Finally, the mention of optimal trade-offs and code constructions suggests a systems (cs.SY) aspect.
